title: Contrary to the rumors, Microsoft has not made any official announcements regarding the appointment of Dolly Chaiwala as the brand ambassador for Windows 12. The genesis of this rumor can be traced back to a post by The Bindu Times, a satirical news parody account on Instagram. The catalyst for this rumor was Bill Gates’ visit to India, during which he made a stop at Dolly Chaiwala’s tea stall. A video titled ‘One Chai Please’ captured Gates enjoying a cup of tea brewed by Dolly himself.
vclaim: No substantive claims can be extracted as the provided content appears to be HTML markup for social media loading screens rather than an actual fact-check article.
